blocks.content: Disjoint union of two classes. This is a way of creating a set which contains elements corresponding to each element of ` A ` or ` B ` , tagging each one with whether it came from ` A ` or ` B ` . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 20-Jun-2022.)

blocks.name: nfdju
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for disjoint union. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 23-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfdju(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cdju(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, cdju(c0, c1), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1)))
  df-dju(c0, c1)
  nfun(s0, cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1))
  nfxp(s0, csn(emptycls), c0)
  nfcv(s0, csn(emptycls))
  nfxp(s0, csn(c1o), c1)
  nfcv(s0, csn(c1o))
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1o)
  diff.c1o.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfdju(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ F/(s0,(c0 ⊔ c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, (c0 ⊔ c1), (({ ∅ } × c0)⋃({ 1o } × c1)))
  df-dju(c0, c1)
  nfun(s0, ({ ∅ } × c0), ({ 1o } × c1))
  nfxp(s0, { ∅ }, c0)
  nfcv(s0, { ∅ })
  nfxp(s0, { 1o }, c1)
  nfcv(s0, { 1o })
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1o)
  diff.c1o.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: djuex
blocks.content: The disjoint union of sets is a set. For a shorter proof using ~ djuss see ~ djuexALT . (Contributed by AV, 28-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm djuex(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cdju(c0, c2), universe))
} = {
  syl5eqel(cdju(c0, c2), universe, cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  df-dju(c0, c2)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c2)), universe), wcel(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), universe), wcel(cxp(csn(c1o), c2), universe))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), universe))
  sylan(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), universe), wcel(csn(emptycls), universe))
  a1i(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(csn(emptycls), universe))
  snex(emptycls)
  xpexg(csn(emptycls), universe, c0, c1)
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cxp(csn(c1o), c2), universe), wcel(csn(c1o), universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csn(c1o), universe))
  snex(c1o)
  xpexg(csn(c1o), universe, c2, c3)
  unexg(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), universe, cxp(csn(c1o), c2), universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm djuex(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0 ⊔ c2)∈ 𝕌)
} = {
  syl5eqel((c0 ⊔ c2), universe, (({ ∅ } × c0)⋃({ 1o } × c2)), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  df-dju(c0, c2)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (({ ∅ } × c0)⋃({ 1o } × c2))∈ 𝕌, ({ ∅ } × c0)∈ 𝕌, ({ 1o } × c2)∈ 𝕌)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, ({ ∅ } × c0)∈ 𝕌)
  sylan(c2 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c1, ({ ∅ } × c0)∈ 𝕌, { ∅ } ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(c2 ∈ c3, { ∅ } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(emptycls)
  xpexg({ ∅ }, universe, c0, c1)
  sylan(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, ({ 1o } × c2)∈ 𝕌, { 1o } ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(c0 ∈ c1, { 1o } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(c1o)
  xpexg({ 1o }, universe, c2, c3)
  unexg(({ ∅ } × c0), universe, ({ 1o } × c2), universe)
}

blocks.content: Left closure of disjoint union. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 21-Jun-2022.)

thm djulcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(cinl, c0), cdju(c1, c2)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(cinl, c0), cdju(c1, c2), cop(emptycls, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cinl, c0), cop(emptycls, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cop(emptycls, c0), cxp(csn(emptycls), c1)))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, universe, cop(emptycls, c0), cxp(csn(emptycls), c1), cinl, cop(emptycls, cv(hs0)))
  opeq2(cv(hs0), c0, emptycls)
  df-inl(hs0)
  syl6eleqr(cop(emptycls, c0), cdju(c1, c2), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c1), cxp(csn(c1o), c2)), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cop(emptycls, c0), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c1), cxp(csn(c1o), c2))), wcel(cop(emptycls, c0), cxp(csn(emptycls), c1)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cop(emptycls, c0), cxp(csn(emptycls), c1)), wcel(emptycls, csn(emptycls)))
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
  opelxpi(emptycls, csn(emptycls), c0, c1)
  elun1(cop(emptycls, c0), cxp(csn(emptycls), c1), cxp(csn(c1o), c2))
  df-dju(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cop(emptycls, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm djulcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(inl ` c0)∈(c1 ⊔ c2))
} = {
  eqeltrd((inl ` c0), (c1 ⊔ c2), < ∅, c0 >, c0 ∈ c1)
  syl2anc(c0 ∈ c1, (inl ` c0)= < ∅, c0 >, c0 ∈ 𝕌, < ∅, c0 > ∈({ ∅ } × c1))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, universe, < ∅, c0 >, ({ ∅ } × c1), cinl, < ∅, hs0 >)
  opeq2(hs0, c0, emptycls)
  df-inl(hs0)
  syl6eleqr(< ∅, c0 >, (c1 ⊔ c2), (({ ∅ } × c1)⋃({ 1o } × c2)), c0 ∈ c1)
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, < ∅, c0 > ∈(({ ∅ } × c1)⋃({ 1o } × c2)), < ∅, c0 > ∈({ ∅ } × c1))
  mpan(c0 ∈ c1, < ∅, c0 > ∈({ ∅ } × c1), ∅ ∈ { ∅ })
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
  opelxpi(emptycls, { ∅ }, c0, c1)
  elun1(< ∅, c0 >, ({ ∅ } × c1), ({ 1o } × c2))
  df-dju(c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(< ∅, c0 >)
}

thm djurcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  df-inr(hs0)
  syl6eleqr(cop(c1o, c0), cdju(c2, c1), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c2), cxp(csn(c1o), c1)), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cop(c1o, c0), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c2), cxp(csn(c1o), c1))), wcel(cop(c1o, c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cop(c1o, c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1)), wcel(c1o, csn(c1o)))

blocks.name: djulf1o
blocks.content: The left injection function on all sets is one to one and onto. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 22-Jun-2022.)

thm djulf1o() {
  |- wf1o(cinl, universe, cxp(csn(emptycls), universe))
} = {
  mptru(wf1o(cinl, universe, cxp(csn(emptycls), universe)))
  f1o2d(hs0, hs1, cinl, universe, cxp(csn(emptycls), universe), cop(emptycls, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), wtru)
  df-inl(hs0)
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cop(emptycls, cv(hs0)), cxp(csn(emptycls), universe)))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cop(emptycls, cv(hs0)), cxp(csn(emptycls), universe)), wcel(emptycls, csn(emptycls)))
  snid(emptycls)
  opelxpi(emptycls, csn(emptycls), cv(hs0), universe)
  fvexd(c2nd, cv(hs1), wa(wtru, wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(csn(emptycls), universe))))
  ad2antll(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(csn(emptycls), universe)), wb(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(emptycls, cv(hs0)))))
  bicomd(wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(csn(emptycls), universe)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(emptycls, cv(hs0))))
  3bitr3g(wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(csn(emptycls), universe)), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(emptycls, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), wceq(cop(emptycls, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(cop(emptycls, cv(hs0)), cop(emptycls, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)))))
  eqeq2d(cop(emptycls, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), cop(emptycls, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(csn(emptycls), universe)))
  eqtrd(cv(hs1), cop(emptycls, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(csn(emptycls), universe)))
  1st2nd2(cv(hs1), csn(emptycls), universe)
  opeq1d(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), emptycls, wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(csn(emptycls), universe)))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs1), cxp(csn(emptycls), universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), csn(emptycls)))
  xp1st(cv(hs1), csn(emptycls), universe)
  elsni(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), emptycls)
  eqcom(cop(emptycls, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))
  mpbiran(wceq(cop(emptycls, cv(hs0)), cop(emptycls, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), wceq(emptycls, emptycls))
  eqid(emptycls)
  opth(emptycls, cv(hs0), emptycls, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)))
  0ex()
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(csn(emptycls), universe))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(csn(emptycls), universe))
  diff.hs1.c(cop(emptycls, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}

thm djulf1o() {
  ⊢ (inl : 𝕌 ↔({ ∅ } × 𝕌))
} = {
  mptru((inl : 𝕌 ↔({ ∅ } × 𝕌)))
  f1o2d(hs0, hs1, cinl, universe, ({ ∅ } × 𝕌), < ∅, hs0 >, (2nd ` hs1), wtru)

  snid(emptycls)
  opelxpi(emptycls, { ∅ }, hs0, universe)
  fvexd(c2nd, hs1, (T ∧ hs1 ∈({ ∅ } × 𝕌)))
  ad2antll(wtru, hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈({ ∅ } × 𝕌), (hs0 =(2nd ` hs1)↔ hs1 = < ∅, hs0 >))
  bicomd(hs1 ∈({ ∅ } × 𝕌), hs0 =(2nd ` hs1), hs1 = < ∅, hs0 >)
  3bitr3g(hs1 ∈({ ∅ } × 𝕌), hs1 = < ∅, hs0 >, hs0 =(2nd ` hs1), < ∅, hs0 > = hs1, < ∅, hs0 > = < ∅,(2nd ` hs1)>)
  eqeq2d(< ∅, hs0 >, hs1, < ∅,(2nd ` hs1)>, hs1 ∈({ ∅ } × 𝕌))
  eqtrd(hs1, < ∅,(2nd ` hs1)>, <(1st ` hs1),(2nd ` hs1)>, hs1 ∈({ ∅ } × 𝕌))
  1st2nd2(hs1, { ∅ }, universe)
  opeq1d((1st ` hs1), (2nd ` hs1), emptycls, hs1 ∈({ ∅ } × 𝕌))
  syl(hs1 ∈({ ∅ } × 𝕌), (1st ` hs1)= ∅, (1st ` hs1)∈ { ∅ })
  xp1st(hs1, { ∅ }, universe)

  eqid(emptycls)

blocks.name: djuexALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ djuex , which is shorter, but based indirectly on the definitions of ` inl ` and ` inr ` . (Proposed by BJ, 28-Jun-2022.) (Contributed by AV, 28-Jun-2022.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: eldju1st
blocks.content: The first component of an element of a disjoint union is either ` (/) ` or ` 1o ` . (Contributed by AV, 26-Jun-2022.)

blocks.name: eldju2ndl
blocks.content: The second component of an element of a disjoint union is an element of the left class of the disjoint union if its first component is the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 26-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm eldju2ndl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdju(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cdju(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cdju(c1, c2)), wi(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1)), wo(wcel(c0, cxp(csn(emptycls), c1)), wcel(c0, cxp(csn(c1o), c2))))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cdju(c1, c2)), wo(wcel(c0, cxp(csn(emptycls), c1)), wcel(c0, cxp(csn(c1o), c2))), wcel(c0, cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c1), cxp(csn(c1o), c2))))
  eleq2i(c0, cdju(c1, c2), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c1), cxp(csn(c1o), c2)))
  df-dju(c1, c2)
  elun(c0, cxp(csn(emptycls), c1), cxp(csn(c1o), c2))
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cxp(csn(emptycls), c1)), wcel(c0, cxp(csn(c1o), c2)), wi(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxp(csn(emptycls), c1)), wi(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1)), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1))))
  elxp6(c0, csn(emptycls), c1)
  a1d(wa(wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1))), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1))
  simprr(wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxp(csn(c1o), c2)), wi(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1)), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(c1o)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2))))
  elxp6(c0, csn(c1o), c2)
  ad2antrl(wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(c1o)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2), wi(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1)))
  3syl(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(c1o)), wi(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c1o), wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls))
  elsni(cfv(c1st, c0), c1o)
  mpbiri(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c1o), wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wne(c1o, emptycls))
  1n0()
  neeq1(cfv(c1st, c0), c1o, emptycls)
  com12(wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1))
  eqneqall(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls, wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1))
}

blocks.name: eldju2ndr
blocks.content: The second component of an element of a disjoint union is an element of the right class of the disjoint union if its first component is not the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 26-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm eldju2ndr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdju(c1, c2)), wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cdju(c1, c2)), wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cdju(c1, c2)), wi(wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2)), wo(wcel(c0, cxp(csn(emptycls), c1)), wcel(c0, cxp(csn(c1o), c2))))
  bitri(wcel(c0, cdju(c1, c2)), wo(wcel(c0, cxp(csn(emptycls), c1)), wcel(c0, cxp(csn(c1o), c2))), wcel(c0, cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c1), cxp(csn(c1o), c2))))
  eleq2i(c0, cdju(c1, c2), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c1), cxp(csn(c1o), c2)))
  df-dju(c1, c2)
  elun(c0, cxp(csn(emptycls), c1), cxp(csn(c1o), c2))
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cxp(csn(emptycls), c1)), wcel(c0, cxp(csn(c1o), c2)), wi(wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxp(csn(emptycls), c1)), wi(wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2)), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1))))
  elxp6(c0, csn(emptycls), c1)
  ad2antrl(wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c1), wi(wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2)))
  syl(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(emptycls)), wi(wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls))
  elsni(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls)
  eqneqall(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls, wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxp(csn(c1o), c2)), wi(wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2)), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(c1o)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2))))
  elxp6(c0, csn(c1o), c2)
  a1d(wa(wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(c1o)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2))), wne(cfv(c1st, c0), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2))
  simprr(wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), csn(c1o)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2))
}

blocks.name: djuun
blocks.content: The disjoint union of two classes is the union of the images of those two classes under right and left injection. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 22-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm djuun(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cun(cima(cinl, c0), cima(cinr, c1)), cdju(c0, c1))
} = {
  eqssi(cun(cima(cinl, c0), cima(cinr, c1)), cdju(c0, c1))
  ssriv(hs0, cun(cima(cinl, c0), cima(cinr, c1)), cdju(c0, c1))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cima(cinl, c0), cima(cinr, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdju(c0, c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinl, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinr, c1))))
  jaoi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinl, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinr, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdju(c0, c1)))
  syl6eleqr(cv(hs0), cdju(c0, c1), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinl, c0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinl, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(emptycls), c0)))
  rexlimddv(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinl, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(emptycls), c0)), wceq(cfv(cinl, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinl, c0)), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cfv(cinl, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  mp2an(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinl, c0)), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cfv(cinl, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wfn(cinl, universe), wss(c0, universe))
  ax-mp(wfn(cinl, universe), wf1o(cinl, universe, cxp(csn(emptycls), universe)))
  f1ofn(cinl, universe, cxp(csn(emptycls), universe))
  ssv(c0)
  fvelimab(hs1, cinl, universe, c0, cv(hs0))
  eqeltrrd(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cfv(cinl, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cfv(cinl, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  simprr(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinl, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cfv(cinl, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  syl5eqel(cfv(cinl, cv(hs1)), cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cop(emptycls, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cfv(cinl, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(cinl, cv(hs1)), cop(emptycls, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wcel(cop(emptycls, cv(hs1)), universe))
  opex(emptycls, cv(hs1))
  fvmptg(hs2, cv(hs1), universe, cop(emptycls, cv(hs1)), universe, cinl, cop(emptycls, cv(hs2)))
  opeq2(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), emptycls)
  ad2antrl(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinl, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cfv(cinl, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(emptycls, cv(hs1)), cxp(csn(emptycls), c0)))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cop(emptycls, cv(hs1)), cxp(csn(emptycls), c0)), wcel(emptycls, csn(emptycls)))
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
  opelxpi(emptycls, csn(emptycls), cv(hs1), c0)
  elun1(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1))
  syl6eleqr(cv(hs0), cdju(c0, c1), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinr, c1)))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinr, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), c0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1)))
  rexlimddv(hs1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinr, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(c1o), c1)), wceq(cfv(cinr, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinr, c1)), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cfv(cinr, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  mp2an(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(cinr, c1)), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cfv(cinr, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wfn(cinr, universe), wss(c1, universe))
  ax-mp(wfn(cinr, universe), wf1o(cinr, universe, cxp(csn(c1o), universe)))
  f1ofn(cinr, universe, cxp(csn(c1o), universe))
  ssv(c1)
  fvelimab(hs1, cinr, universe, c1, cv(hs0))
